jchrest.architecture

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • jchrest.architecture.Node

  • public class Node
extends java.util.Observable
    Represents a node within a Chrest model's long-term memory (LTM) discrimination network. Each #this has a unique reference with respect to the LTM network of the Chrest model it is located in and a time of creation. A #this usually has "children" that are composed of a Link that terminates with another Node. Each Node maintains a non-mutable contents instance variable that is the aggregation of all ListPatterns found on the tests of Links that must be passed to reach #this in the LTM of the Chrest this #this is associated with. Each Node also contains an image that may change over the Node's lifespan. The image of a Node is also referred to as being a chunk and may be empty. Note that a Node's contents and image are two distinct concepts. As well as the vertical Links described, a Node may also contain horizontal associations with other Nodes:
    • General: an association between two Nodes of any Modality; does not represent any particular concept. A Node may only have one general association.
    • Naming: an association between a Modality.VISUAL Node and a Modality.VERBAL Node that represents a concept where something that is seen has a verbal identifier. A Modality.VISUAL Node may only have one naming association and the association is unilateral (from Modality.VISUAL to Modality.VERBAL).
    • Production: an association between a Modality.VISUAL Node and an Modality.ACTION Node that represents a concept where, given a visual state of the environment, some action is performed. A production also has a value that may serve to represent a concept such as the optimality of the production (this is where ReinforcementLearning becomes useful). A Modality.VISUAL or Modality.ACTION Node is not limited to how many production associations it may have and the associations are unilateral (from Modality.VISUAL to Modality.ACTION).
    • Semantic: an association between two Nodes of the same Modality that represents a concept whereby information that occurs with a high temporal proximity is likely to be related. A Node is not limited to how many semantic associations it may have and the associations can be bilateral.
    A Node may also become a template whereby it stores the images of other Nodes in a data structure (slots) that can be accessed when the template Node is accessed (links and associations to this information do not have to be traversed). A Node may be a "root" modality node, i.e. it is at the "top" level of LTM and classifies the modality of all its children. A modality root node contains no information about the external environment and the image and contents it is initialised with will not be modified during its lifetime. Furthermore, a root node contains no horizontal associations with other Nodes and can not become a template. Methods support learning and also display.

      • getContents

        public ListPattern getContents()
        Returns:
        The contents of this #this, i.e. the aggregation of ListPatterns that are tests on the jchrest.architecture.Links that must be passed to arrive at this #this from the relevant modality root Node (the contents of the relevant modality root Node are excluded from the ListPattern returned).

        Returns:

      • getFilledSlots

        public ListPattern getFilledSlots(int time)
        Returns:
        The contents of filled item/position with no duplicate Patterns. Three values may be returned: null (if #this is not a template at the time specified or has no entry in its filled item/position slot history data structures at a time earlier than or equal to the time specified), an empty ListPattern (if #this is a template but hasn't had either its item/position slots filled earlier than or equal to the time specified) or a non-empty ListPattern (if #this is a template and has had either its item/position slots filled earlier than or equal to the time specified).

      • getAllInformation

        public ListPattern getAllInformation(int time)
        Parameters:
        time -
        Returns:
        A ListPattern containing the concatenation of #this#getContents(), #this#getImage(int) and #this#getFilledSlots(int) at the time specified, with no duplicate PrimitivePatterns.
